payload.title: Implement custom error classes and validation utilities
payload.description:
Implement custom error classes and validation utilities for the diagram generator module. Includes:

- ValidationError class for input validation failures
- CircularDependencyError class for graph validation
- RenderingError class for Mermaid syntax issues
- MermaidValidator utility for syntax validation
- Input validation helpers and type guards
- Error message standardization

These utilities provide robust error handling and validation across all diagram generator components.
payload.notes: Foundation utilities. Should be implemented early as other components depend on these error classes and validators.
